content: On the + operation a new String object is created at each iteration. Suppose words contains the elements ["Foo", "Bar", "Bam", "Baz"]. At runtime, the method creates thirteen Strings:
stemmed: On + oper new string object creat iter . suppos word contain element [ `` foo '' , `` bar '' , `` bam '' , `` baz '' ] . At runtim , method creat thirteen string :
